lines.text: [after exiting the room of a bloody corpse]
Did you see it?
Yes! While we out fumbling with that music, the lousy bastard was in there killing her! BASTARD! BAAAAASTAAARD! BASTAAARD!
Have you ever been laid on a waterbed?
The most beautiful thing in the world is smoking pot and fucking on a waterbed, at the same time.
Where did you come from?
What?
Where. Did. You. Just. Come. From?
I was upstairs in the library.
GOOD! I'll be talking to you later.
You'll be playing so much tennis it'll be coming out of your ears!
Oh, hey, it's my Kung Fu professor. What's the story, Chao?
Ohhh, I am out jogging and next thing I know I am on ground! Something I eat, bad chop suey. So long!
The lieutenant asked me to help Sgt. Holding go through some records down at City Hall.
Well, well. Isn't the lieutenant unorthodox?
Well...
Who knows? Right now we're just buying clothes without labels and trying them on for size.
I'll send you a box of lollipops.
The killer is someone that is either on or near the campus!
Full background, IN DEPTH! If you have to, use the department's full budget!
Okay, Lieutenant.
Heh, I figured you'd like that. But do your best job, pal. I don't think we have much time before the next one.
Professor Brown... you see... is a homosexual.
I guess I'm so used to bodies... dead ones... that I'm callous.
I'm very strong, you know.
The coffee is fine. I love the cream.
Yes. Well, this is New England, of course.
[first lines; residing the nursery rhyme Humpty Dumpty]
Humpty Dumpty sat on a wall, Humpty Dumpty had a great fall. All the king's horses and all the king's men Couldn't put the pieces together again.
